138.movie_plot: 57 years later, Ellen Ripley is rescued by a deep salvage team during her hypersleep. The moon from the original movie has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, colonial marines have impressive firepower, but will that be enough?

45.movie_plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, Vietnam, Watergate, and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

78.movie_plot: A meditation on power, and the metaphor of the body of state, based on the real episode of dementia experienced by George III (now suspected a victim of porphyria, a blood disorder). As he ...

208.movie_plot: Two friends who are dissatisfied with their jobs decide to join the army for a bit of fun.

106.movie_plot: Two straight men mistakenly end up on a "gays only" cruise.

96.movie_plot: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action, while attempting to liberate a twelve-year-old prostitute.

35.movie_plot: Adaptation of James Jones' autobiographical 1962 novel, focusing on the conflict at Guadalcanal during the second World War.

10.movie_plot: An old Jewish woman and her African-American chauffeur in the American South have a relationship that grows and improves over the years.

136.movie_plot: A veteran policeman, Murtaugh, is partnered with a younger, suicidal officer, Riggs. They both have one thing in common: hating working in pairs. Now they must learn to work with one another to stop a gang of drug smugglers.

110.movie_plot: A couple of high school grads spend one final night cruising the strip with their buddies before they go off to college.

77.movie_plot: A businessman thwarts his wife's bequest of an estate to another woman.

194.movie_plot: In the midst of the Gulf War, soldiers are kidnapped and brainwashed for sinister purposes.

75.movie_plot: A hapless New York advertising executive is mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and is pursued across the country while he looks for a way to survive.

39.movie_plot: A young Shakespeare, out of ideas and short of cash, meets his ideal woman and is inspired to write one of his most famous plays.

176.movie_plot: A scheming widow and her manipulative ex-lover make a bet regarding the corruption of a recently married woman.

209.movie_plot: Story of a woman and her three lovers.

69.movie_plot: A young police officer must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

4.movie_plot: A woman leaves an Austrian convent to become a governess to the children of a Naval officer widower.

58.movie_plot: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as a distress call, its landing on the source moon finds one of the crew attacked by a mysterious lifeform, and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

211.movie_plot: A group of friends, just out of college, struggle with adulthood.

135.movie_plot: Inspector Clouseau is put on the case when the Pink Panther diamond is stolen, with the Phantom's trademark glove the only clue.

87.movie_plot: Two youngsters from rival New York City gangs fall in love, but tensions between their respective friends build toward tragedy.

196.movie_plot: Jackie Cogan is an enforcer hired to restore order after three dumb guys rob a Mob protected card game, causing the local criminal economy to collapse.

1.movie_plot: Robert Ford, who's idolized Jesse James since childhood, tries hard to join the reforming gang of the Missouri outlaw, but gradually becomes resentful of the bandit leader.

210.movie_plot: The love lives of two brothers, Mickey and Francis, interconnect as Francis cheats on his wife with Mickey's ex-girlfriend, while Mickey impulsively marries a stranger.

64.movie_plot: A rich high school student tries to boost a new pupil's popularity, but reckons without affairs of the heart getting in the way.

120.movie_plot: Producers Max Bialystock and Leo Bloom make money by producing a sure-fire flop.

167.movie_plot: A nerdish store owner is revived out of cryostasis into a future world to fight an oppressive government.

104.movie_plot: Dr. Ellie Arroway, after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of extraterrestrial intelligence, sending plans for a mysterious machine.

24.movie_name: Day the Earth Stood Still, The (1951)
24.movie_plot: A remake of the 1951 classic science fiction film about an alien visitor and his giant robot counterpart who visit Earth.

148.movie_plot: Jake Blues, just out from prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and brother Elwood were raised.

113.movie_plot: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from the corruption that Scarecrow and the League of Shadows have cast upon it.

131.movie_plot: In 1941, as Japan prepares to open its war against the USA with a pre-emptive strike on Pearl Harbor, a series of American mistakes threatens to inadvertently aggravate its effectiveness.

52.movie_plot: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.

98.movie_plot: A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers, discuss movies, and play hockey on the store roof.

189.movie_plot: A stark, perverse story of murder, kidnapping, and police corruption in a Mexican border town.

25.movie_plot: After the death of a friend, a writer recounts a boyhood journey to find the body of a missing boy.

156.movie_plot: Kermit and his newfound friends trek across America to find success in Hollywood, but a frog legs merchant is after Kermit.

184.movie_plot: A comic allegory about a traveling Bushman who encounters modern civilization and its stranger aspects, including a clumsy scientist and a band of revolutionaries.

19.movie_plot: Military lawyer Lieutenant Daniel Kaffee defends Marines accused of murder. They contend they were acting under orders.

93.movie_plot: A compassionate young man, raised in an orphanage and trained to be a doctor there, decides to leave to see the world.

51.movie_plot: In London, four very different people team up to commit armed robbery, then try to doublecross each other for the loot.

3.movie_plot: When a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

127.movie_plot: A ship sent to investigate a wave of mysterious sinkings encounters the advanced submarine, the Nautilus, commanded by Captain Nemo.

21.movie_plot: When a Roman General is betrayed, and his family murdered by an emperor's corrupt son, he comes to Rome as a gladiator to seek revenge.

180.movie_plot: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

134.movie_plot: A "typical" day in the life of The Beatles, including many of their famous songs.

108.movie_plot: A small-town boy obsessed with the Italian cycling team vies for the affections of a college girl.

124.movie_plot: When a recently-deceased ghost couple find their now-vacant home invaded by an obnoxious family, they hire a sleazy ghost who gets rid of humans to help them.

146.movie_name: Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory (1971)
146.movie_plot: Charlie receives a golden ticket to a factory, his sweet tooth wants going into the lushing candy, it turns out there's an adventure in everything.

54.movie_plot: An exclusive golf course has to deal with a brash new member and a destructive dancing gopher.

101.movie_plot: A convicted rapist, released from prison after serving a fourteen-year sentence, stalks the family of the lawyer who originally defended him.

159.movie_plot: With his oldest daughter's wedding approaching, a father finds himself reluctant to let go.

32.movie_plot: The life of a Russian physician and poet who, although married to another, falls in love with a political activist's wife and experiences hardship during the First World War and then the October Revolution.

205.movie_plot: A woman gets involved in an impersonal affair with a man. She barely knows about his life, only about the sex games they play, so the relationship begins to get complicated.

182.movie_plot: A resourceful British government agent seeks answers in a case involving the disappearance of a colleague and the disruption of the American space program.

89.movie_plot: In Casablanca in December 1941, a cynical American expatriate encounters a former lover, with unforeseen complications.

71.movie_plot: A Hollywood studio executive is being sent death threats by a writer whose script he rejected - but which one?

116.movie_name: All Quiet on the Western Front (1930)
116.movie_plot: A young soldier faces profound disillusionment in the soul-destroying horror of World War I.

188.movie_plot: Three actors accept an invitation to a Mexican village to perform their onscreen bandit fighter roles, unaware that it is the real thing.

166.movie_plot: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.
